EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar reminder - Data Science-Driven Software Product Innovation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/data-science-driven-software-product-innovation]]>
Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar Data Science-Driven Software Product Innovation on Thursday, August 11, 2016. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, August 11, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 11:00AM PDT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1221784/D36A3607EFEAF9048EF8AD8CD7D07B6D]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
